information.name: Denoising
information.description:
This block denoises images using a pre-trained convolutional autoencoder. It accepts a file path to an input image, processes it to add noise, denoises it, and saves both noisy and denoised images.

 Inputs:
- `image_path` (str): Path to the input image.

 Outputs:
- `dict`: Contains paths to the noisy image (`input_result`) and the denoised image (`result`).
